m_szDocTitle: Why Molycorp (MCP) Is Gaining Today - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Why Molycorp (MCP) Is Gaining Today By Lindsay Ingram | 01/02/14 - 12:30 PM EST Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) --Â Molycorp ( MCP ) rose 3.9% in Thursday trading after analyst firm DA Davidson lifted the company's price target to $8 from $6. Analyst Avinash Kant believes the mining company is "uniquely positioned" to become a "dominant low-cost supplier of critical rare earth materials."
